'''''Other Hands'' 5''' is an issue of ''[[Other Hands]]'', a magazine devoted to ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing|MERP]]''.

* '''Published:''' April [[1994]]

==Contents==
*Editorial: Round Two - [[Chris Seeman]]
*Communications - Eduardo Martinez Santamariá
*Frontlines - [[Chris Seeman]]
*''Semper Fidelis'': Some Ideas for a Second Age Campaign - [[Anders Blixt]]
*Before the Trial: An Introduction to a Second Age Campaign - Pete Clark
*The Journal of Eponian Círdanea - Scott Stanek
*Tarma Tar-Calion: A Historical Note on the Haven of Umbar - [[Chris Seeman]]
*The Queen of Shadow: A Fourth Age Campaign - [[Anders Blixt]]
